while on holiday in the Czech Republic
Heinonen would reach out to fellow

its worth as a super-rare title spurring

in the country in his final visit to
Prague in 2002 he found no other copies
though a handful of other collectors

Germany France and Italy years later
it's difficult to say how many copies of

360 u.s. dollars when sold depending on

would go on to become part of the team
